NYC teens and young adults can find help with navigating City resources, including a variety of topics, trips, and inspirational youth profiles.


Details Component

The Details Component is a “native accordion component” for showing and hiding content. It uses the <details> and <summary> HTML elements. It can be styled with CSS, is decently accessible, and it doesn’t require any JavaScript to work!

Demonstration

Click this summary to see more.

This is the details body. Any amount of content and links can be placed here. Read more about the Details disclosure element in the MDN documentation.

Markup

<!--{ @id Must be unique }-->
<details class="c-details bc-gray" id="a686fe397bc85">
  <summary class="c-details__summary bc-blue c-white">Click this summary to see more.</summary>
  <div class="c-details__body">
    <p>This is the details body. Any amount of content and links can be placed here. Read more about the <a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/details">Details disclosure element in the MDN documentation</a>.</p>
  </div>
</details>
